document.full_text: with the game over and the sun perhaps setting on their time in glendale, ariz., the phoenix coyotes raised their sticks at midice and saluted the chanting crowd.
document.title: coyotes, after being swept, skate off into unknown
lines_and_colors: with the game over and the sun perhaps setting on their time in glendale, ariz., the phoenix coyotes raised their sticks at midice and saluted the chanting crowd.
